name: Hit The Ninja
description:
The evil scientist you are working under is planning to destroy the town 'Enevel'. But the town has a great protector  ninja 'Ninkai' who  is a big trouble for him. He needs you to distract the ninja for one minute while he destroys the town with his evil robots. 

Use the robot and try to hit the ninja as much as you can. The ninja is fast and precise but vulnerable when in air. Use the blasters to hit the ninja. You can also fight the ninja  using your sword and shield. Press "Right Click " to switch between you and the robot. 

Your attack speed  and  movement speed are faster than the robot but you deal less damage. The game ends after a minute. Try to get as high score as possible.

Controls:

Move Left/Right: A/D

Jump: Spacebar

Attack/Shoot : Mouse Left Click

Switch between players: Right Click

Have Fun! 

Please comment if there are any bugs or  suggestions!
